name: vianetz/pdf-generator
description: A library that supports method for generating PDF documents based on DomPdf and FPDI.

suggest.horstoeko/zugferd: Create Zugferd documents with this merger library
suggest.vianetz/signaturportal-api: Use this library to sign your generated PDF documents.
suggest.tecnickcom/tcpdf: Necessary if you want to use TCPDF for merging. By default this package uses the fpdf merger.
